channel.title: Sets of Stats
channel.description: Recent content on Sets of Stats

item.title: About
item.description: Sets of Stats is a place to write about sports statistics in Australia (mainly the A-League and AFL). In my non spare time I also do data analysis

item.title: Bart Schenkeveld isn't used the passing the ball this much
item.description: Broadly, there’s two types of Centre Halves that have graced the A-League across its 14 year run, you’ve got those built in the Kevin Muscat mould, who are capable of kicking you off the park, while somewhow remaining on it themselves (with one very major exception) and the Patrick Zwaanswijk types, who seem to be able to avoid all types of confrontation by seemingly always being a step ahead of it.
